titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax treatment of smoking cessation costs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/5/2003--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit as an itemized medical deduction a medicine or drug taken as part of a pharmacotherapy prescribed by a physician as part of a smoking cessation program.
